Metadata: This brochure is advertises the Sharks of Oregon poster (See ORESU-G-04-009)

Worldwide, there are more than 400 species of sharks. Fifteen of them inhabit the waters off the Oregon coast at least part of each year. This new color brochure contains illustrations and descriptions of each species, focusing on size, distinguishing characteristics​, and usual habitats. It also offers tips for avoiding shark attacks.
